channel.title: R-Shiny on Christian König
channel.description: Recent content in R-Shiny on Christian König

item.title: Web applications with R-Shiny
item.description: Web applications with R-Shiny Shiny allows building interactive web applications from R while having access to all the tools that set the language apart, i.e. advanced data processing, modeling and visualization capabilities and thousands of user-contributed packages. During my postdoc, I was part of the ODMAP project to promote better documentation and reporting of biodiversity models. ODMAP stands for Overview, Data, Model, Assessment and Prediction and provides a step-by-step protocol to ensure a reproducible modeling workflow.
